meaning: 1. Breaking point price 2. Below cost price
description: Ice melts at 0°C, meaning price hits rock bottom or goes below cost. Similar terms: cabbage price (dirt cheap), vomiting blood price (slashing price), jumping off building price (fire sale), diving price (huge drop), loss price, parachuting price, terror price.

examples.chinese: 新史低的破冰价,机不可失
examples.translation: New historical low breaking ice price, don't miss chance

examples.chinese: 大促开始,全平台最低,跳水清仓破冰价
examples.translation: Big promo starts, lowest on all platforms, diving clearance breaking ice price

examples.chinese: 你去买二手都买不到这价格,限时破冰价
examples.translation: Can't even buy at this price secondhand, limited time breaking ice price
